data.title: Venus on the Half-Shell and Others by Philip Jose Farmer Signed by Philip Jose Farmer: Fine Hardcover (2008) First Edition., Signed by Author(s)
data.meta_description: ISBN: 9781596061422 - Signed by Author(s) - First Edition. - Hardcover - Subterranean Press, Burton, MI - 2008 - Condition: Fine - Fine - Venus on the Half-Shell and Others by Philip Jose Farmer Signed A sharp tight copy. Bright blue gilt to spine. Bright pictorial dust jacket. Not price clipped. First Edition stated. Limited to 125 deluxe numbered copies. This is # 115 of 125. Signed by author on limitation page. In blue cloth slipcase. - Venus on the Half-Shell and Others by Philip Jose Farmer Signed
